item.title: The Versioning Scheme Your Users Understand
item.description: Are you tired of spending countless hours debating the finer points of Semantic Versioning? Do you find yourself wanting to adjust the meaning of bug vs feature just to fit a versioning scheme or marketing goal? Is your date based versioning schema too complicated because it gives users nearly no context as to what may have changed in your software? Do you wish that somehow you could version not only your software, but your entire application stack, web addresses or even chat rooms?
